Keep in mind that none of the G1's are available for use that are
laying on the floor of the Ark.

In the past some of the G1's have come through some sort of time
portal allowing them to be here. Rodimus and even Cyclonus fell under
this clause. However as we have so many G1's floating around is it
possible that you can think of another way for him to get here?

Animated Ratchet is supose to be old and I think it was hinted that he
is old enough to be the original Ratchet.

I do have a question. You already have Night Shift, Quickstride, Rat
Trap, Straight Shot, Tucson, and Uproar, why the sudden interest in
Ratchet?

- Preston



On 7/9/11, Sandy <magicquartz@...> wrote:
> I was wondering if anyone was playing Ratchet at all?  If not I wouldn't
> mind
> Playing him.  Tucson's personality almost matches Ratchet's and yes I have
> watched all the G 1 episodes to know about how Ratchet worked.  No known as
> the most sociable mech but he is dedicated to his faction and his work.  Let
> me know if that's okay with you guys
>
>
